articles.title: 2 charged in Brockton killing after months as fugitives, DA says
articles.description:
Micheal Thompson, 35, and Dayana Slade, 25, were found in Maine after the fatal shooting of Mike Jonas, 40, prosecutors said.

The post 2 charged in Brockton killing after months as fugitives, DA says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Micheal Thompson, 35, and Dayana Slade, 25, charged in Brockton murder of Mike Jonas, 40.
Suspects captured in Maine after months as fugitives, highlighting regional law enforcement collaboration.
Community concerns rise as violent crime persists in Brockton, prompting calls for increased safety measures.

articles.title: Red Sox reportedly tried to trade for standout shortstop this offseason
articles.description:
"Predictably, the Angels set a very high bar when it came to the return and the two teams were unable to match up.”

The post Red Sox reportedly tried to trade for standout shortstop this offseason appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox attempted to trade for Angels shortstop Zach Neto this offseason.
Angels demanded a high return, preventing a deal from happening.
This move reflects Red Sox's strategy to strengthen their roster for upcoming season.

articles.title: Former driving school owner gets 1 day in jail for RMV bribery scheme
articles.description:
“Mr. Cardoso participated in a long-term public corruption scheme that endangered public safety by putting unqualified drivers on the road."

The post Former driving school owner gets 1 day in jail for RMV bribery scheme appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Former driving school owner, Mr. Cardoso, sentenced to 1 day in jail for bribery.
Cardoso's actions compromised public safety by allowing unqualified drivers on Boston roads.
The case highlights ongoing concerns about corruption within the RMV affecting local residents.

articles.title: Stefon Diggs and Cardi B may have broken up following Patriots Super Bowl loss
articles.description:
Diggs and Cardi B have a baby boy together whom they welcomed last November.

The post Stefon Diggs and Cardi B may have broken up following Patriots Super Bowl loss appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Stefon Diggs and Cardi B may have ended their relationship after the Patriots' Super Bowl loss.
The couple welcomed a baby boy together in November 2022.
Boston residents may feel the impact of this breakup due to Diggs' local sports prominence.
